''We have been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time,'' said Eric Schmidt in announcing the decision. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come.
